fmiModelDescription.description: System consisting of tree pumps and multiple sinks (consumer).

Item.name: DynamicFreeInitial
Item.description: DynamicFreeInitial -- Dynamic balance, Initial guess value

Item.name: FixedInitial
Item.description: FixedInitial -- Dynamic balance, Initial value fixed

Item.name: SteadyStateInitial
Item.description: SteadyStateInitial -- Dynamic balance, Steady state initial with guess value

Item.name: SteadyState
Item.description: SteadyState -- Steady state balance, Initial guess value

ScalarVariable.name: system.p_ambient
ScalarVariable.description: Default ambient pressure

ScalarVariable.name: system.T_ambient
ScalarVariable.description: Default ambient temperature

ScalarVariable.name: system.g
ScalarVariable.description: Constant gravity acceleration

ScalarVariable.name: system.allowFlowReversal
ScalarVariable.description: = false to restrict to design flow direction (port_a -> port_b)

ScalarVariable.name: system.energyDynamics
ScalarVariable.description: Default formulation of energy balances

ScalarVariable.name: system.massDynamics
ScalarVariable.description: Default formulation of mass balances

ScalarVariable.name: system.substanceDynamics
ScalarVariable.description: Default formulation of substance balances

ScalarVariable.name: system.traceDynamics
ScalarVariable.description: Default formulation of trace substance balances

ScalarVariable.name: system.momentumDynamics
ScalarVariable.description: Default formulation of momentum balances, if options available

ScalarVariable.name: system.m_flow_start
ScalarVariable.description: Default start value for mass flow rates

ScalarVariable.name: system.p_start
ScalarVariable.description: Default start value for pressures

ScalarVariable.name: system.T_start
ScalarVariable.description: Default start value for temperatures

ScalarVariable.name: system.use_eps_Re
ScalarVariable.description: = true to determine turbulent region automatically using Reynolds number

ScalarVariable.name: system.m_flow_nominal
ScalarVariable.description: Default nominal mass flow rate

ScalarVariable.name: system.eps_m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Regularization of zero flow for |m_flow| < eps_m_flow*m_flow_nominal

ScalarVariable.name: system.dp_small
ScalarVariable.description: Default small pressure drop for regularization of laminar and zero flow

ScalarVariable.name: system.m_flow_small
ScalarVariable.description: Default small mass flow rate for regularization of laminar and zero flow

ScalarVariable.name: pump_1.allowFlowReversal
ScalarVariable.description: = true to allow flow reversal, false restricts to design direction (port_a -> port_b)

ScalarVariable.name: pump_1.port_a.m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from the connection point into the component

ScalarVariable.name: pump_1.port_a.p
ScalarVariable.description: Thermodynamic pressure in the connection point

ScalarVariable.name: pump_1.port_a.h_outflow
ScalarVariable.description: Specific thermodynamic enthalpy close to the connection point if m_flow < 0

ScalarVariable.name: pump_1.port_b.m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from the connection point into the component

ScalarVariable.name: pump_1.port_b.p
ScalarVariable.description: Thermodynamic pressure in the connection point

ScalarVariable.name: pump_1.port_b.h_outflow
ScalarVariable.description: Specific thermodynamic enthalpy close to the connection point if m_flow < 0

ScalarVariable.name: pump_1.p_a_start
ScalarVariable.description: Guess value for inlet pressure

ScalarVariable.name: pump_1.p_b_start
ScalarVariable.description: Guess value for outlet pressure

ScalarVariable.name: pump_1.m_flow_start
ScalarVariable.description: Guess value of m_flow = port_a.m_flow

ScalarVariable.name: pump_1.V_flow_single_init
ScalarVariable.description: Used for simplified initialization model

ScalarVariable.name: pump_1.delta_head_init
ScalarVariable.description: Used for simplified initialization model

ScalarVariable.name: pump_1.checkValve
ScalarVariable.description: = true to prevent reverse flow

ScalarVariable.name: pump_1.V
ScalarVariable.description: Volume inside the pump

ScalarVariable.description: Formulation of energy balance

ScalarVariable.description: Enthalpy flow across boundaries or energy source/sink

ScalarVariable.description: Heat flow across boundaries or energy source/sink

ScalarVariable.name: pump_1.Wb_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Work flow across boundaries or source term

ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate (total)

ScalarVariable.description: Volume flow rate (total)

ScalarVariable.description: Shaft rotational speed

ScalarVariable.description: Power Consumption (single pump)

ScalarVariable.description: Power Consumption (total)

ScalarVariable.name: pump_1.eta
ScalarVariable.description: Global Efficiency

ScalarVariable.description: Curvilinear abscissa for the flow curve in parametric form (either mass flow rate or head)
